data.name: Devilian - Complete Pack
data.detailed_description:
Battle your way across Nala with these incredible treasures! In addition to awesome boosts and bonuses like 30 days of Patron status, Expansion Tickets, and 2 brand new Talismans, you'll also get a ferocious Wild Tigris mount and an adorable pet Nanus.

30-day Patron Access

Gain 25% more EXP, earn special daily rewards, access your Warehouse anywhere, and more!

Wild Tigris Mount

A ferocious tiger mount that will only answer to you

Nanus Pet

A loyal companion that will collect items for you

8 Inventory Expansion Tickets

Gain 64 additional Inventory slots

50 Megaphones

Broadcast a message to the whole world

7-day Elara's Blessing

Earn 50% more XP and Devil Souls

Resplendent Expansion Rune

Gain 40 additional Warehouse slots

Skill Page Expansion Ticket

Unlock an additional Skill Page

Furious Jirah Talisman

Earn 5% more XP and 2.5% more Gold in Dungeons

Benevolent Tempera Talisman

Earn 10% more XP and Gold in the Abyssal Tower

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Vista / 7 / 8 / 8.1 / 10 (64 bit)
  • Processor: 2Ghz Dual Core
  • Memory: 3 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA 9800 GTX / AMD HD 5670
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 8 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Registered Trion Account, Glyph Client, and acceptance of License and Usage terms
